attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For incompetence (as described by Gordon Brown).  The voters and tax payers of this country have every right to expect Ministers with access to the largest budget in the land, to be at least competent.  The Prime Minister must act, to restore some public confidence that there is still honour and honesty in UK political parties.  Peter Hain should have resigned; he decided not to - now he MUST be dismissed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
